value: 8741 - Management Services Summary > EXLSERVICE AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover management services. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. EXLSERVICE AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is headquartered in Camberwell, Victoria. It is headed by director Martin Steven Artenstein. For the 2023 financial year, the company reported revenue of $35.37 million. Its net profit totalled $3.06 million. EXLSERVICE AUSTRALIA PTY LTD forms part of the services industry sector.
